page.title: 20Exploring Aust and Littleton
page.content: This D-Block is a very interesting area to explore. Using the centre of Aust village, the Motorway Service Area and Littleton as bases it is possible to walk most of the land area. By walking along the banks of the River Severn you can see most of the D-Block. However you must be particulary careful when you get to the Aust Interchange as it is always very busy with traffic on its way to and from Wales. The information about this D-Block has been collected by twenty-eight first year pupils at Lockleaze Secondary School, Bristol. Most of the information has come from personal observation and questions although some use has been made of guidebooks.
